languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс не изменяется в лице, но белую кожу усеивают алые глазки кровоточащих ран — кости гемункула прорастают наружу устрашающими зазубренными шипами. Вкрадчивый голос шелестит:{/n} "Что ты сказал{mf||а}?"

{n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс не изменяется в лице, но белую кожу усеивают алые глазки кровоточащих ран — кости гемункула прорастают наружу устрашающими зазубренными шипами. Вкрадчивый голос шелестит:{/n} "Что ты сказал{mf||а}?"

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの表情は変わらない。しかし、その白い肌が血を流す傷によってまだら模様になり、骨が恐ろしい有刺鉄線のように伸びていく。彼は、滑らかな声で尋ねる。{/n}「何と言った？」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスの表情は変わらない。しかし、その白い肌が血を流す傷によってまだら模様になり、骨が恐ろしい有刺鉄線のように伸びていく。彼は、滑らかな声で尋ねる。{/n}「何と言った？」

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯的表情没有一丝变化，但他惨白的皮肤上浮现出了无数流血的伤口，满是尖刺的骨头也从皮肤下面刺了出来。他以极其柔和的声音对你问道。{/n}“你刚刚说什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯的表情没有一丝变化，但他惨白的皮肤上浮现出了无数流血的伤口，满是尖刺的骨头也从皮肤下面刺了出来。他以极其柔和的声音对你问道。{/n}“你刚刚说什么？”

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Tervantias ne change pas, mais sa peau blafarde est tachetée de plaies sanglantes lorsque ses os la percent comme de terribles piques barbelées. D'une voix doucereuse, il demande :{/n}« Qu'avez-vous dit ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Tervantias ne change pas, mais sa peau blafarde est tachetée de plaies sanglantes lorsque ses os la percent comme de terribles piques barbelées. D'une voix doucereuse, il demande :{/n}« Qu'avez-vous dit ? »

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Tervantias no cambia, pero su piel blanca queda moteada por heridas sangrantes conforme sus huesos la atraviesan como espantosas espinas serradas. Con voz sedosa, pregunta:{/n} «¿Qué has dicho?».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Tervantias no cambia, pero su piel blanca queda moteada por heridas sangrantes conforme sus huesos la atraviesan como espantosas espinas serradas. Con voz sedosa, pregunta:{/n} «¿Qué has dicho?».

languages.text: {n}Tervantias' Miene bleibt unverändert, aber seine weiße Haut ist mit einem Mal von blutenden Wunden durchsetzt, als sie seine Knochen wie entsetzliche Spieße durchbohren. Er fragt mit samtweicher Stimme:{/n} "Was habt Ihr da gesagt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantiass Miene bleibt unverändert, aber seine weiße Haut ist mit einem Mal von blutenden Wunden durchsetzt, als sie seine Knochen wie entsetzliche Spieße durchbohren. Er fragt mit samtweicher Stimme:{/n} "Was habt Ihr da gesagt?"

languages.text: {n}Tervantias'ın yüz ifadesi değişmezken kemikleri, korkunç iğneli dikenler gibi büyüyerek beyaz teninde benek benek kanayan yaralar meydana getiriyor. İpeksi bir sesle soruyor.{/n} "Ne dedin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias's expression does not change, but his white skin becomes speckled with bleeding wounds as his bones grow through it like horrifying barbed spikes. He asks, his voice silken,{/n} "What did you say?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias'ın yüz ifadesi değişmiyor ancak kemikleri korkunç iğneli dikenler gibi büyüyerek, beyaz teninde benek benek kanayan yaralar meydana getiriyor. İpeksi bir sesle soruyor:{/n} "Ne dedin?"
